name: alif-mentorship-hub
description: A comprehensive mentorship and learning platform designed to empower Somali high school students

scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && find . -type d -name __pycache__ -delete && find . -type f -name '*.pyc' -delete
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:backend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && python manage.py migrate && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput

author: Alif Mentorship Hub Team
